Class ZipContainerServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object

    public class ZipContainerServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContainerServiceAPI

      • initialize

        public void initialize(com.guardtime.ksi.service.client.http.HttpClientSettings httpClientSettings,
                       java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
